scripts.test: npm run buildProdBrowser && sed 's/var rudderanalytics/rudderanalytics/g' dist/rudder-analytics.min.js > __tests__/prodsdk.js && jest --coverage --verbose
scripts.buildProdBrowser: NODE_ENV=false PROD_DEBUG=true STAGING=$npm_config_staging ENV=prod uglify=true rollup -c
scripts.size: npm run clean && npm run buildProdBrowser && npm run buildAllIntegrations && npm run buildForNpm && size-limit
scripts.buildDevIntegration: PROD_DEBUG=true NODE_ENV=false uglify=false INTG_NAME=AdobeAnalytics rollup --config rollup.intgConfig.js
scripts.buildDevIntegrationCLI: PROD_DEBUG=true NODE_ENV=false uglify=false INTG_NAME=$npm_config_intg rollup --config rollup.intgConfig.js
scripts.buildProdIntegration: PROD_DEBUG=true NODE_ENV=false ENV=prod uglify=true INTG_NAME=AdobeAnalytics rollup --config rollup.intgConfig.js
scripts.buildProdIntegrationCLI: PROD_DEBUG=true NODE_ENV=false ENV=prod uglify=true INTG_NAME=$npm_config_intg rollup --config rollup.intgConfig.js
scripts.bundle-size-visual-integration: ENV=prod PROD_DEBUG=true uglify=true visualizer=true INTG_NAME=AdobeAnalytics rollup --config rollup.intgConfig.js
scripts.bundle-size-visual-integration-cli: ENV=prod PROD_DEBUG=true uglify=true visualizer=true INTG_NAME=$npm_config_intg rollup --config rollup.intgConfig.js
scripts.clean: find dist -type f -name '*.js' -delete && find dist -type f -name '*.js.map' -delete && rm -rf dist/integrations
